org.apache.hcatalog.hbase.snapshot
Interface RevisionManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
RevisionManagerProtocol
All Known Implementing Classes:
RevisionManagerEndpoint, RevisionManagerEndpointClient, ZKBasedRevisionManager
public interface RevisionManager

This interface provides APIs for implementing revision management.

Field Summary
static long VERSION
          Version property required by HBase to use this interface for CoprocessorProtocol / RPC.
 
Method Summary
 void abortWriteTransaction(Transaction transaction)
          Abort the write transaction.
 Transaction beginWriteTransaction(String table, List<String> families)
          Start the write transaction.
 Transaction beginWriteTransaction(String table, List<String> families, long keepAlive)
          Start the write transaction.
 void close()
          Closes the revision manager.
 void commitWriteTransaction(Transaction transaction)
          Commit the write transaction.
 TableSnapshot createSnapshot(String tableName)
          Create the latest snapshot of the table.
 TableSnapshot createSnapshot(String tableName, long revision)
          Create the snapshot of the table using the revision number.
 void createTable(String table, List<String> columnFamilies)
          Setup revision management for a newly created hbase table.
 void dropTable(String table)
          Remove table data from revision manager for a dropped table.
 List<FamilyRevision> getAbortedWriteTransactions(String table, String columnFamily)
          Get the list of aborted Transactions for a column family
 void initialize(Configuration conf)
          Initialize the revision manager.
 void keepAlive(Transaction transaction)
          Extends the expiration of a transaction by the time indicated by keep alive.
 void open()
          Opens the revision manager.
